mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD(ref, title, content, writer) VALUES((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(bno), 0)+1 FROM TBL_BOARD B) , #{title}, #{content}, #{writer});
INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD(ref, step, depth, parent_bno, title, content, writer) VALUES(#{ref}, #{step}, #{depth}, #{parentBno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer});
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET blind_yn = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND (bno = #{bno} OR parent_bno = #{bno})
mapper.select: SELECT bno, ref, step, depth, title, content, writer, regdate, blind_yn FROM tbl_board WHERE 1=1 AND blind_yn = 'N' ORDER BY ref DESC, depth ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
